#include <iostream>
#include <map>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    char str[100];
    map<string, int> m;
    int t, k = 1;
    cin >> t;

    while(t--) {
        cin >> str;
        m[str]++;

        if(m[str] == k) {
            cout << k<<" ";
            cout << str<<endl;
            k++;
        }
    }


}
